subject: Prudential Center (Newark)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: After years of infighting, Jeff Vanderbeek, the controlling owner of the New Jersey Devils, has bought out his partners and now owns all of the team and its home, the Prudential Center.
snippet: After years of infighting, Jeff Vanderbeek, the controlling owner of the New Jersey Devils, has bought out his partners and now owns all of the team and its home, the Prudential Center.
